CustomField.description:
When calculating a subtotal, if one score input has this checked, the total weight will be bumped to 100%.
For example, if a CSAT subtotal field has only the input of Sponsor CSAT weighted at 80%, the score will be calculated as if the weight is 100%
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When calculating a subtotal, if one score input has this checked, the total weight will be bumped to 100%.
CustomField.label: Round Up Weight
